data.title: European Election 2024
data.text:
NOTICE OF POLL

EUROPEAN AND LOCAL ELECTIONS 2024

CONSTITUENCY OF SOUTH

Take Notice that, pursuant to a writ issued to me by the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage , I will take a poll on 7th June 2024, between the hours of 07:00am and 10:00pm to elect five members of the European Parliament for this constituency.

The names and descriptions of the candidates standing nominated and of their proposers (if any), and the order in which they will appear on the ballot paper, are set out hereunder.

BLIGHEIRELAND FIRST

(Derek Blighe, of Croughevoe, Mitchelstown, Cork

Bricklayer)

Replacement List: IFBOGUE

(Lorna Bogue, of 2 Calderwood Circle, Donnybrook, Douglas, Cork

Councillor)

Replacement List: LBDE BARRA

(Graham de Barra, of Clashduv House, Glasheen, Cork

Human Rights Campaigner)

Proposed By: Marie Cash of 1 Brook Ave, Lehenaghmore, Cork

DOYLENON PARTY

(Christopher V.S. Doyle, of Ballytory, Broadway, Wexford Y35 R7YY

Engineer)

Replacement List: CDDOYLESOCIAL DEMOCRATS

(Susan Doyle, of Unit 5, Village Green, Church Road, Douglas, Cork T12 R90F

Solicitor)

Replacement List: SDFITZGIBBONNON PARTY

(Mary Fitzgibbon, of Two Hearts Cottage, Cloontarriv, Ballymacelligott, Tralee, Co. Kerry V92 AC93

Nursing Lecturer)

Replacement List: MFFUNCHIONSINN FÉIN - European United Left/Nordic Green Left Group (GUE/NGL)

(Kathleen Funchion, of 91 Blackthorn Close, Rathullord, Kilkenny R95 TRR0

T.D.)

Replacement List: SFGAVANSINN FÉIN

Senator)

Senior Manager)

Member of the European Parliament)

(Sean Kelly, of Gortroe, Killarney, Kerry

M.E.P.)

Replacement List: FGLAHIVETHE IRISH PEOPLE

(Ross Lahive, of 9 Church Street, Cork

Carpenter)

Replacement List: IPLEAHYIRISH FREEDOM PARTY (I.F.P.)

(Michael Leahy, of Clifden, Corofin, Co Clare

Architect & Planner)

MC GURK

(Una Mc Gurk, of 65, Orchard Grove Court, Kenmare, Co. Kerry

Barrister)

(John Mullins, of 5 Linn Corr, Castlemartyr, Co. Cork

Director)

(Patrick Murphy, of Derrycarhoon, Ballydehob, Co Cork

Chief Executive Officer)

Proposed By: Finian Toomey of Caonach bán, Lower Killeens, Commons Road/Blarney, Cork

Replacement List: ANÍ MHURCHÚFIANNA FÁIL - Renew Europe, Alliance of Liberals and Democrats for Europe (ALDE)

Barrister)

Replacement List: FFO'RIORDANNON PARTY

(Ciaran O'Riordan, of 12 Buckleys Terrace, Boyces St, Cork T23 K0V3

Home Maker)

O'SULLIVANGREEN PARTY/COMHAONTAS GLAS - The Greens-European Free Alliance/European Green Party

(Grace O'Sullivan, of 31 Crobally Heights, Tramore, Co Waterford

MEP)

33, Washington Street, Cork. T12 E22D
